general.name: Name
about.text1: Hi there! We're Austin and Rachel, the makers of FreeRoam. Austin programs and Rachel designs. We're living in a 1987 Alpenlite fith wheel with our dog, Topher.
about.text2: Our goal with FreeRoam is to build the ultimate community and resource for boondockers.
about.text3: We are not in this to get rich. We hope that this can one day support our costs, but past that we intend to direct any additional revenue toward the community.
about.text4: All of the code for FreeRoam is Open-Source, which means anyone can read through the underlying code that makes up the app
about.text5: We're doing this to be as transparent as possible. We live in a time where tech companies do some pretty shady things to make more money, and we want to be the embody opposite of that.
about.text6: If you would like to get in touch, you can send an email to austin@freeroam.app
about.text7: As an Amazon Associate we, or the partner that referred you, earn from qualifying purchases
app.defaultInstallMessage: Add FreeRoam to your homescreen to quickly access all features anytime
app.stillLoading: We're still loading this page. If this message remains for more than a few seconds, send us an email with the version of Android you're using: austin@freeroam.app
channelDrawer.title: Chat channels
conversation.joinMessage: Welcome! Tap the button below to join this group
conversationImageView.title: Image
conversations.jumpNew: You're viewing old messages. Jump to new messages.
getAppDialog.text: Get the app on Android or iOS!
installOverlay.title: Add FreeRoam to homescreen
installOverlay.instructions: Select 'Add to homescreen' to pin the FreeRoam web app
meta.defaultDescription: Helpful tools and people for the boondocking lifestyle
nps.appStore1: We'd love it if you could rate FreeRoam in the app store :)
nps.appStore2: Having more ratings helps us a lot!
nps.description: Loving the app? Have a suggestion? Your feedback helps shape FreeRoam.
nps.num1to10: Must be a number between 0 and 10
nps.title: Thoughts?
offlineOverlay.text: Looks like you're offline. Reconnect to the internet to resume
partners.text1: One of our primary goals with FreeRoam is to help others make money on the road.
partners.text2: You can apply to become a FreeRoam Partner to have your Amazon affiliate link used when you refer users to the app. If you refer someone to our app, we think *you* deserve the commission - not us - so we'll use your affiliate link 100% of the time in our product guides.
partners.text3: As we add more functionality, we'll try to figure out other ways to reward partners for helping us grow the app
partners.text4: We want to work closely with all of our partners and use their feedback to shape the future of the app, so we're keeping it a small group by setting some basic requirements:
partners.text5: To apply, send an email to austin@freeroam.app
signInDialog.terms: By registering, you agree to our {tos}
